title: out of range
body: It's been two months since they say solve the problem with the resolution. I can not play on boardless or windowed have big lags. Will you finally solve this problem or to simply delete the game. I do not understand how you do not realize that the terrible lags

replies.body: If you're getting n out of range error, pressing Alt+Enter could toggle your full screen as a workaround.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can look at your specific case individually with you.  We'll help figure out why it's happening for you and how to fix it up!
